ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I'd recommend it to anyone who will be working in developing countries and who needs to understand the reason they do business the way they do. I believe that without this course, I'd often be wondering why firms and politicians in developing countries - ones I'll be working in - are the way that they are.I'd recommend it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: N.B. I already submitted my answers to this on the SOM online course evaluation, that's why I declined to answer all above questions in order to avoid duplication of responses.

For my future work in a region that is mostly made up of developing countries, this course has shed light on the complexities I'll deal with in terms of politicians, foreign and domestic firms, and competing interests for economic resources.
